author: Matty P.
text:
“The Yellow Sessions” are intimate moments with me, where I will be singing some of my favorite songs by some of my favorite artists. 

I will also be sharing songs from my previous albums as well as debuting songs from my upcoming second album “Yellow”. https://t.co/EFozHIDYPE
